price: Sakınıp takvalı olsunlar diye hiçbir eğriliği bulunmayan Arapça bir Kur'an. (indirdik)
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
